Text.Page: You must be really bored. I mean, there's a war going on, and here you are chatting me up.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Yeah..."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

I noticed it the moment I laid my eyes on you. Just a bored, lazy, no good . Heh.

Go ask {@LinkCreature:63#3002#Taratia} to play twenty questions with you.

Hee-hee. Yeah, we're all going a little mad, aren't we?

Twenty questions is possibly the best game ever, but I need materials, and I need them delivered yesterday to Santia in the workshop.

So, another time?
Sun essence. You ever wonder where this stuff comes from? I mean, really? Yeah, me either.
You don't actually have to travel to the sun to get sun essence. You know that, right?
Thanks, <PCNAME>. Taratia was right about you. Trustworthy, fast, and efficient.
Are you the one Taratia sent to bring me krymetal ore? Well, where is it?
In all seriousness, one of these days we all need to get together for drinks and laughs. Someday, when all of this is over, maybe.
